CatDescriptText: Harris may have photographed this wrecked Owl Cab company taxi no. 56 (ca. 1948 Ford Super Deluxe four-door sedan) to support an insurance claim.  Owl Cab company, established in 1948,  was the only Black owned cab company in Pittsburgh for many years.  Owl Cab was owned by Dr. Silas Knox and his partner and was located at 16 Perry Street in the Hill District.
TitMainTitle: Boy wearing dark coat and dark knit cap, standing on sidewalk next to Owl Cab taxicab number 56, with front end damage, and streetcar in background
